item.title: A new theme.. again?
item.description: So yes, I switched themes again. This is the second time! This time I made it from scratch. It’s called “Cardio”, because it has a paper layout. Also because it’s trimmed of fat. Why new theme, and why not use a pre-existing one? I wanted to learn Hugo some more, since I’m genuinely interested in the Hugo CMS. What better way than to make a Hugo theme? I was also not satisfied with the old theme.
